entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
